attributes.action: The UK government to use 10% of the Lotto good causes to fund the NHS
attributes.additional_details: I agree that people from every walk of life the length and breadth of the country have been helped by good causes. Surely after recent events and seeing how precious the NHS is to this country we should cut the good causes amount to 15% and use the remaining 10% to fund NHS staff and equipement. A panel of NHS representatives decide where those monies are best suited
attributes.background: The national lotto gives around 25% of the money it raises to good causes. I propose that 10% funds the NHS

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303376
